happy: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
sad: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Every storm runs out of rain.
Crying is how your heart speaks when your lips can’t explain the pain.
tired: Rest when you’re weary. Refresh and renew yourself.
Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is rest.
motivated: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Dream big and dare to fail.
